data.actual_result: The message option sheet doesn't pop up.
data.expected_result: The message action sheet pops up.
data.short_description: There's no message action sheet for uploads just after a message.
data.steps_to_repro: - Upload a file to a channel (make sure that you haven't sent any message in the channel in the last 7 minutes). - Long press on the place above the message (while the modal is still there). - Observe the message action sheet. - Now, go to a channel where you have sent a message in the last 7 minutes. - Upload a file. - Try to long press anywhere on/ around the modal.
